Articles.Content:
So there's a bug with the stock temperature gauges which explains why my game consistently crashes whenever I try to fly my SSTOs into orbit.

There's a mod [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120731](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120731) that disables them, but I still need to know how hot my plane parts get. 

Are there any mods that add alternative temperature gauges?

[Thermal Monitor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116888-1-0-x-The-Plugin-Workshop-Small-plugins-of-varied-function) adds temperature and heating rate to right click menu

[Heat Warning](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116773-1-0-HeatWarning) gives you alarms when parts start reaching high temperatures

[Critical Temperature Gauge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119686-1-0-2-Critical-temperature-gauge-%28DR-supported%29) displays the temperature of the part closest to exploding graphically
Oh, thanks! I found Thermal Monitor, but wasn't what I wanted. Those other two are good ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
